title: WEBTOON Entertainment Inc. (WBTN) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
description: WEBTOON Entertainment Inc. (NASDAQ:WBTN) Q2 2025 Earnings Conference Call August 12, 2025 4:30 PM ETCompany ParticipantsDavid J.
content:
David J. Lee - CFO, COO & Director

 Junkoo Kim - Founder, CEO & Chairman of the Board

 Soohwan Kim - Corporate Participant

 Yongsoo Kim - Chief Strategy Officer & Head of Global

Thank you for standing by. My name is John, and I will be your conference operator today. At this time, I would like to welcome everyone to the WEBTOON Entertainment Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call. [Operator Instructions]

I would now like to turn the call over to Soohwan Kim, Vice President of Investor Relations. Please go ahead.

Good afternoon, and thank you for joining us. Our remarks today will include forward-looking statements those regarding our future plans, objectives and expected performance, in particular, our guidance for the next quarter. Actual results may vary materially from today's statements. Information concerning risks, uncertainties and other factors could cause these results to differ is included in our SEC filings, including those stated in the Risk Factors section of our annual report on Form 10-K. These forward-looking statements represent our outlook only as of the date of this call. We undertake no obligation to revise or update any forward-looking statements. Additionally, the matter we'll discuss today will include both GAAP and non-GAAP financial measures. Reconciliations of any non- GAAP financial measures to the most directly comparable GAAP measures are set forth in our earnings press release. Non-GAAP financial measures should be considered in addition to and not as a substitute for GAAP measures.

Joining me today on the
summary: WebTOON Entertainment Inc. (WBTN) has hosted a second quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call, with contributions from David J. Lee, CEO, CFO, COO, and Chairman of the Board. The company's forward-looking statements include statements regarding its future plans, objectives, and expected performance, but these statements may differ significantly from current events. The call will also include both GAAP and non-taxpayer terms.
shortSummary: Weeboe Entertainment's Q2 2025 earnings call will include forward-looking statements about future plans, objectives, and non-GAAP financials, highlighting potential risks and uncertainties.
argos_summary: WEBTOON Entertainment held its Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call, featuring key executives including CFO David J. Lee and CEO Junkoo Kim. The call included forward-looking statements regarding the company's future plans and performance, with a reminder that actual results may differ due to various risks and uncertainties. The discussion also covered both GAAP and non-GAAP financial measures, with reconciliations provided in the earnings press release.
